title: Statement Response
description: Response for statement request, containing account statement

count.description: Number of transactions returned in this call

action_type.description: It is the type of action.

amount.description: It is the amount of transaction.

longcode.description: The description of contract purchased if description is set to `1`.

purchase_time.description: Time at which contract was purchased, present only for sell transaction

reference_id.description: Internal transaction identifier for the corresponding buy transaction ( set only for contract selling )

shortcode.description: Compact description of the contract purchased if description is set to `1`.

transaction_id.description: It is the transaction ID. In statement every contract (buy or sell) and every payment has a unique ID.

transaction_time.description: It is the time of transaction.

msg_type.description: Action name of the request made.

req_id.description: Optional field sent in request to map to response, present only when request contains `req_id`.
